channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bob Weir Was the Dead’s Invisible Thread
item.description: The songwriter, guitarist and singer, who died at 78, animated the Grateful Dead from within.

item.title: Bob Weir, Guitarist and Founding Member of The Grateful Dead, Dies at 78
item.description: His songwriting and rhythm guitar playing helped shape the San Francisco band’s sound as it became an American institution.

item.title: Bob Weir: 10 Essential Songs
item.description: The guitarist, singer and songwriter, who died at 78, cut his own path among his elders in the Grateful Dead, and beyond.
